name: Do Not Donut
description:
An entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. As a fanatic Donut hater, cause chaos in the city by spreading rumors and lies. Your goal is to take out the local donut shop. Are you capable of that much chaos? 

Controls: WASD for movement, Interact onscreen button to Interact.

For the best experience play in Fullscreen mode.
